name: opencti
label: OpenCTI
description: OpenCTI is an open threat intelligence platform where you can store, organize, visualize and share knowledge about cyber threats.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access Token
fields.name: access_token
fields.description: Specify the access token to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the access token to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to True.

operations.title: Create Organization
operations.description: Creates an organization in the OpenCTI database based on the organization name, description, and reliability that you have specified.

parameters.title: Organization Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the organization to create in the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the organization to create in the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Organization Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify a description of the organization being created on the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description of the organization being created on the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Reliability
parameters.name: reliability
parameters.tooltip: Specify the reliability of the organization being created on the OpenCTI server database. You can choose from the following options: A - Completely reliable B - Usually reliable C - Fairly reliable D - Not usually reliable E - Unreliable F - Reliability cannot be judged
parameters.description: Specify the reliability of the organization being created on the OpenCTI server database. You can choose from the following options: A - Completely reliable B - Usually reliable C - Fairly reliable D - Not usually reliable E - Unreliable F - Reliability cannot be judged

operations.title: Get Organizations
operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of organizations based on count of records and the page token that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.

operations.title: Create Label
operations.description: Creates a label based on the label name that you have specified.

parameters.title: Label Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the label that you want to create on the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the label that you want to create on the OpenCTI server database.

operations.title: Get Labels
operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of labels based on count of records and the page token that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.

operations.title: Create External Reference
operations.description: Creates an external reference object based on the external reference URL and a source name that you have specified.

parameters.title: External Reference URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Specify an external reference URL of the external reference object that you want to create in the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an external reference URL of the external reference object that you want to create in the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Source Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the source name of the external reference object that you want to create in the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the source name of the external reference object that you want to create in the OpenCTI server database.

operations.title: Get External References
operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of external reference objects based on count of records and the page token that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.

operations.title: Get Marking Definition
operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of marking definition objects based on count of records and the page token that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.

operations.title: Create Indicator
operations.description: Create an indicator based on the indicator type, value, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the type of indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Account Domain Email File-MD5 File-SHA1 File-SHA256 Host IPv4 IPv6 Registry Key URL
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Account Domain Email File-MD5 File-SHA1 File-SHA256 Host IPv4 IPv6 Registry Key URL

parameters.title: Indicator Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Specify the value of indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the value of indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Associate Indicator To Observable
parameters.name: x_opencti_create_indicator
parameters.description: If checked and indicator entry will be created and associated with the observable
parameters.tooltip: If checked and indicator entry will be created and associated with the observable.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify a description of indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description of indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Score
parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Specify a score for the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. Score range is 0 to 100. Default value is 50.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a score for the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. Score range is 0 to 100. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: Created By
parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: Specify the organization ID to associate with the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. NOTE: You can use the Get Organizations action to find all the organization IDs or the Create Organization action to create a new organization ID.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the organization ID to associate with the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. NOTE: You can use the Get Organizations action to find all the organization IDs or the Create Organization action to create a new organization ID.

parameters.title: Marking Definition ID
parameters.name: marking_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the marking definition ID to associate with the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. NOTE: You can use the Get Marking Definition action to find all marking definition IDs.
parameters.description: Specify the marking definition ID to associate with the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. NOTE: You can use the Get Marking Definition action to find all marking definition IDs.

parameters.title: Label ID
parameters.name: label_id
parameters.description: Specify the label ID to associate with the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. NOTE: You can use the Get Labels action to find all label IDs or Create Label action to create a new label ID.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the label ID to associate with the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. NOTE: You can use the Get Labels action to find all label IDs or Create Label action to create a new label ID.

parameters.title: External Reference ID
parameters.name: external_reference_id
parameters.description: Specify the external reference ID to associate with the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. NOTE: You can use the Get External References action to find all external reference IDs or Create External Reference action to create a new external reference ID.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the external reference ID to associate with the indicator being created on the OpenCTI server database. NOTE: You can use the Get External References action to find all external reference IDs or Create External Reference action to create a new external reference ID.

operations.title: Get Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of indicators based on the count of records, page token, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Search By Value
parameters.name: search_value
parameters.description: Specify the value of the indicator to filter results retrieved from the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the value of the indicator to filter results retrieved from the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results to retrieve in the response. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.
parameters.tooltip: Specify an endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call. When specified the results are retrieved from the specified page. For example: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=.

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the type of indicator to filter results retrieved from the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Account Domain Email File-MD5 File-SHA1 File-SHA256 Host IPv4 IPv6 Registry Key URL
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of indicator to filter results retrieved from the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Account Domain Email File-MD5 File-SHA1 File-SHA256 Host IPv4 IPv6 Registry Key URL

parameters.title: Minimum Score
parameters.name: min_score
parameters.description: Specify a score for the indicator to filter results retrieved from the OpenCTI server database. Score range is 1 to 100.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a score for the indicator to filter results retrieved from the OpenCTI server database. Score range is 1 to 100.

parameters.title: Maximum Score
parameters.name: max_score
parameters.description: Specify a maximum score for the indicator to filter results retrieved from the OpenCTI server database. Score range is 1 to 100.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a maximum score for the indicator to filter results retrieved from the OpenCTI server database. Score range is 1 to 100.

operations.title: Delete Indicator
operations.description: Deletes an indicator based on the indicator ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Indicator ID
parameters.name: indicator_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the indicator to delete from the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the indicator to delete from the OpenCTI server database.

operations.title: Add Indicator Field
operations.description: Adds a field to the indicator based on the indicator ID, field name, and field ID that you have specified. Fields that can be added are Marking Definition and Label.

parameters.title: Indicator ID
parameters.name: indicator_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the indicator in which to add fields in the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the indicator in which to add fields in the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Select the field to add to the indicator in the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Marking Definition, Label.
parameters.tooltip: Select the field to add to the indicator in the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Marking Definition, Label.

parameters.title: Field ID
parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: Specify a marking definition ID or a label ID depending on the selection in the Field parameter. NOTE: You can use Get Marking Definition or Get Labels action to find the ID to populate.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a marking definition ID or a label ID depending on the selection in the Field parameter. NOTE: You can use Get Marking Definition or Get Labels action to find the ID to populate.

operations.title: Update Indicator Field
operations.description: Updates the indicator field based on the indicator ID, field name, and field ID that you have specified. Fields that can be updated are Score and Description.

parameters.title: Indicator ID
parameters.name: indicator_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the indicator for which to update fields in the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the indicator for which to update fields in the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Select the field to update for the indicator in the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Score, Description.
parameters.tooltip: Select the field to update for the indicator in the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Score, Description.

parameters.title: Field Value
parameters.name: field_value
parameters.description: Specify a value of the field to update for the indicator in the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a value of the field to update for the indicator in the OpenCTI server database.

operations.title: Remove Indicator Field
operations.description: Removes an indicator's field value based on the indicator ID, field name, and field ID that you have specified. Field values which can be removed are Marking Definition and Label.

parameters.title: Indicator ID
parameters.name: indicator_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the indicator from which to remove fields in the OpenCTI server database.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the indicator from which to remove fields in the OpenCTI server database.

parameters.title: Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Select the field to remove from the indicator in the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Marking Definition, Label.
parameters.tooltip: Select the field to remove from the indicator in the OpenCTI server database. You can select one of the following options: Marking Definition, Label.

parameters.title: Field ID
parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: Specify a marking definition ID or a label ID depending on the selection in the Field parameter. NOTE: You can use Get Marking Definition or Get Labels action to find the ID to populate.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a marking definition ID or a label ID depending on the selection in the Field parameter. NOTE: You can use Get Marking Definition or Get Labels action to find the ID to populate.
